idea-plugin.name: native2asciiplug
idea-plugin.description: Converts property files with native-encoded characters (characters which are non-Latin 1 and non-Unicode) to Unicode-encoded. Processing is being done automatically during compilation phase.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.1
  • Intellij IDEA 12 compatibility
1.0.0
  • Intellij IDEA 9+ support
